gammatweaks.configuration.defaultGamma.t: Gamma percentage for when Gamma is toggled off
gammatweaks.configuration.toggledGamma.t: Gamma percentage for when Gamma is toggled on
gammatweaks.configuration.updateToggle.t: Enabling this will make the toggle value remember the last non default value you've used
gammatweaks.configuration.gammaStep.tool: Gamma percentage change for every increase or decrease
gammatweaks.configuration.showGammaStatu: Show a status effect when the Gamma percentage is outside normal range
gammatweaks.configuration.resetGammaOnCl: Reset the Gamma value to default when Minecraft closes
gammatweaks.configuration.smoothGammaTra: Make the transition of toggling Gamma smoother
gammatweaks.configuration.gammaTransitio: Speed in percentage per second when Smooth Transition is enabled
gammatweaks.configuration.dynamicGammaEn: Makes Gamma dynamically adjust itself depending on the light level around the player
gammatweaks.configuration.dynamicGammaTr: Dynamic transition speed in percentage per second when the light level changes
gammatweaks.configuration.gammaAveraging: Range in blocks around the player to average the light level of
gammatweaks.configuration.gammaSkyBright: Increasing this makes it possible to have a lower dynamic Gamma when under skylight
gammatweaks.configuration.gammaDimension: Automatically apply different gamma values based on the current dimension
gammatweaks.configuration.gammaOverworld: Gamma percentage to apply when entering the Overworld
gammatweaks.configuration.gammaNetherPre: Gamma percentage to apply when entering the Nether
gammatweaks.configuration.gammaEndPrefer: Gamma percentage to apply when entering the End
gammatweaks.configuration.gammaLimitChec: Should the mod enforce the minimum and maximum Gamma limits
gammatweaks.configuration.minGamma.toolt: Minimum Gamma percentage the mod will allow if the Limit Check is enabled
gammatweaks.configuration.maxGamma.toolt: Maximum Gamma percentage the mod will allow if the Limit Check is enabled
gammatweaks.configuration.showGammaHudMe: Show a message containing the new Gamma percentage when it has changed
gammatweaks.configuration.gammaHudDefaul: Color for HUD messages when Gamma is between 0% and 100%
gammatweaks.configuration.gammaHudPositi: Color for HUD messages when Gamma is above 100%
gammatweaks.configuration.gammaHudNegati: Color for HUD messages when Gamma is below 0%
gammatweaks.configuration.toggledNightVi: Night Vision percentage for when Night Vision is toggled on
gammatweaks.configuration.updateNvToggle: Enabling this will make the toggle value remember the last non zero value you've used
gammatweaks.configuration.nightVisionSte: Night Vision percentage change for every increase or decrease
gammatweaks.configuration.brightenFogCol: When enabled Night Vision will also brighten the fog color, just like vanilla Night Vision
gammatweaks.configuration.showNvStatusEf: Show the Night Vision HUD and inventory icon just like a normal status effect
gammatweaks.configuration.resetNvOnClose: Disable Night Vision when Minecraft closes
gammatweaks.configuration.smoothNvTransi: Make the transition of toggling Night Vision smoother
gammatweaks.configuration.nvTransitionSp: Speed in percentage per second when Smooth Transition is enabled
gammatweaks.configuration.dynamicNvEnabl: Makes Night Vision dynamically adjust itself depending on the light level around the player
gammatweaks.configuration.minDynamicNv.t: Night Vision strength at light level 15
gammatweaks.configuration.maxDynamicNv.t: Night Vision strength at light level 0
gammatweaks.configuration.dynamicNvTrans: Dynamic transition speed in percentage per second when the light level changes
gammatweaks.configuration.nvAveragingLig: Range in blocks around the player to average the light level of
gammatweaks.configuration.nvSkyBrightnes: Increasing this makes it possible to have a lower dynamic Night Vision when under skylight
gammatweaks.configuration.nvDimensionPre: Automatically apply different night vision values based on the current dimension
gammatweaks.configuration.nvOverworldPre: Night Vision percentage to apply when entering the Overworld
gammatweaks.configuration.nvNetherPrefer: Night Vision percentage to apply when entering the Nether
gammatweaks.configuration.nvEndPreferenc: Night Vision percentage to apply when entering the End
gammatweaks.configuration.nvLimitCheck.t: Should the mod enforce the minimum and maximum Night Vision limits
gammatweaks.configuration.minNightVision: Minimum Night Vision percentage the mod will allow if the Limit Check is enabled
gammatweaks.configuration.maxNightVision: Maximum Night Vision percentage the mod will allow if the Limit Check is enabled
gammatweaks.configuration.showNvHudMessa: Show a message containing the current Night Vision status when it has changed
gammatweaks.configuration.nvHudEnabledCo: Color for HUD messages when Night Vision is enabled
gammatweaks.configuration.nvHudDisabledC: Color for HUD messages when Night Vision is disabled
gammatweaks.configuration.namespacedComm: Require 'gammatweaks:' prefix for commands (e.g., /gammatweaks:gamma instead of /gamma)
text.gammatweaks.message.shaderWarning: Shader detected - Gamma may not work. Use Night Vision instead
text.gammatweaks.message.incompatibleWit: Cannot adjust Gamma manually while Dynamic Gamma is enabled
Cannot adjust Night Vision manually while Dynamic Night Vision is enabled
gammatweaks.configuration.title: Gamma Tweaks Configuration
gammatweaks.configuration.dynamic.toolti: Configure dynamic adjustment based on light levels
